trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Roanoke
There were no other sightings in Roanoke on or around July 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting Details on the way home from a friend my girlfriend looks up at the night sky and says look at that those lights I instantly knew what should was talking about. we watched for the first time in our lives anything like this has ever happened to either of us I reached for my phone off course it was dead my girlfriend grabbed gets her album was full so we just went back to watching them after about 5 minutes they were flying in a prefect triangle form never breaking pace of divergent speed from the next the all of a sudden the bottom right light of the triangle disappeared then the left and finally the top it was incredible it was just an instant if you blinked you would've missed them flying away at an incredible speed much faster than anything I've ever seen! in between highway 114 and 170 on 377
Summary: 3 Orange/yellow lights moving across the sky one by one accelerated to unkown speed
